name: Mario Forever (itch)
description:
So this game is way too old!

But first are don't know mario? if you don't know it so you never played old games

this game is from the old games (but not this version it's a copy)

its have been released in nes

its a 2d platformer Game

and after 37 years from releasing mario bros

its doesn't have specs because no one can't play it 

man its just needs 1 KB Vram! hahahahaha!

from bowser because bowser kidnapped her and your mission is save the princess

its free go press Download button now!
